sentences.english: In former times, people used to fight with swords.
sentences.chinese: 過去，人們慣常用刀劍作戰。

sentences.english: Marx, with his usual perversity, thought it was both.
sentences.chinese: 馬克思，帶着慣常的倔強，認爲它兩者都是。

sentences.english: He had his habitual breakfast, hamburger and ham sandwich every morning.
sentences.chinese: 他每天早上都是慣常的早餐，漢堡包和火腿三明治。

sentences.english: This is a normal activity that cats find calming and reassuring.
sentences.chinese: 這是貓兒們讓自己冷靜下來的慣常行動。

sentences.english: The fountain babbled its familiar music.
sentences.chinese: 泉水發出慣常的潺潺聲。

sentences.english: The fish had slowed again and was going at his usual pace.
sentences.chinese: 魚又慢下來了，正用它慣常的速度遊着。

sentences.english: I exercise poor judgement in my decisions and my usual obsessive planning gives way to impulsiveness.
sentences.chinese: 我的判斷變差了而且我慣常的執念給衝動讓道了。

sentences.english: Which language of Foul Language will you usually use?
Examine your habitual reactions to your most common stressors.
sentences.chinese: 檢查你對最普通的緊張性刺激的慣常反應。

sentences.english: Actually this was my pattern for the past ten years.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，這是過去十年裏我的慣常動作。

sentences.english: You may be routinely skipping a step.
sentences.chinese: 你可能慣常地跳過一個步驟。

sentences.english: For once he was wrenched out of his wonted calm.
sentences.chinese: 這一次，他陡然失去了慣常的寧靜態度。

sentences.english: It is common practice to make a back-up file for our documents.
sentences.chinese: 慣常做法是爲正本另立一個後備檔案。

sentences.english: He escorted us at the customary racing-car speed to our guest villa.
sentences.chinese: 他陪同我們以慣常的賽車般的速度直奔賓館。

sentences.english: He suggests that gnosis is just another form of ordinary knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 他暗示靈知僅僅是慣常知識的另一種形式。

sentences.english: Old granny was used to cook it in the rice cooker.
sentences.chinese: 老祖母慣常用電鍋蒸茄子。
